customer_reviews.title: Runs small but great lightweight down otherwise

product_meta.title: Boys' Ultra Lightweight Packable Down Puffer Jacket
feature_bullets: Shell & Lining: 100%Nylon; Filling: 90% White Duck Down/10% Duck Feather

Extra Warmth w/o Weight - Ultra Lightweight [0.3-0.6 lbs] - Very light and compact for school, travel, hiking, camping, excerising, casual wear and in the snow; Quilted winter jacket for boys featuring standing collar with front zipper closure, on-seam zippered pockets and comfortable elastic cuffs which can keep hands warm; Low profile quilt pattern can create heat trapping down channels for extra warmth.
